front.extra:
PRAYER: Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India, for
the issuance of a Writ of Mandamus, directing the respondents to pass on
order to collect professional tax from the staffs and teachers of the Eriyur
Government Higher Secondary School, by the petitioner's panchayat based
on his representation dated 09.10.2021.
